title: Japanese Conversation Completion Quiz - Hard Mode
description: Complete the blanks in these Japanese conversation snippets. This quiz tests your ability to understand and use conversational Japanese effectively.
instructions: Type the appropriate word or phrase in Japanese using Romaji to complete the sentence.
The case (uppercase or lowercase) of your answer does not matter, as long as the spelling is correct.
After completing all questions, submit your answers for scoring.

items.question: Watashi wa maiasa _______ o nomimasu. (I drink coffee every morning.)
Kare wa _______ de shigoto o shite imasu. (He works at a bank.)
Kono hon wa _______ ni tsuite no mono desu. (This book is about history.)
Kanojo wa _______ ga jouzu desu. (She is good at painting.)
Watashitachi wa _______ de yuushoku o tabemashita. (We had dinner at a restaurant.)
Kare wa _______ o hajimete imasu. (He is starting a business.)
Watashi no neko wa itsumo _______ no shita ni kakuremasu. (My cat always hides under the bed.)
Kanojo wa _______ o kaku no ga suki desu. (She likes writing poems.)
Watashitachi no machi ni wa _______ ga takusan arimasu. (Our town has many temples.)
Kare wa _______ ni tsuite kenkyuu shite imasu. (He is researching psychology.)
